message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $22,000 is my absolute lowest price.  I understand that's higher than your initial offer, but I believe the value it brings justifies the cost. What do you say?
